SELECT 'B' AS comType, NULL AS vendorCd, u.USER_ID AS userId, u.USER_PW AS password, u.USER_NM AS userName, u.DEPT_CD AS deptCd, d.DEPT_NM AS deptName FROM by_user u LEFT JOIN dept d ON d.DEPT_CD = u.DEPT_CD AND d.DEL_FLAG = 'N' WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId} AND u.DEL_FLAG = 'N'
UNION ALL

LIMIT 1
